main event: An observer reported seeing a UFO in Brooklyn, New York, on June 8, 1968.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 45 seconds., One object was observed during the sighting., The observer previously submitted photographs of a UFO sighting from August 1967., The photos delivered for analysis demonstrated a pattern of light imagery., The report concluded that the source was unreliable.
sighted object: UFO, round object with different colors
witness description: two individuals who collectively observed the UFO
